snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio, in his on-air debut, took questions on marijuana, police tactics and the governor, often while speaking over the soft strains of a rap track.
abstract: New York City Mayor makes his radio interview debut on hip-hop station Hot 97, marked departure from Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's staid on-air interviews.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio, in his on-air debut, took questions on marijuana, police tactics and the governor, often while speaking over the soft strains of a rap track.

headline.main: De Blasio on Hot 97: New Sound for Mayoral Radio
headline.print_headline: De Blasio on Hot 97: New Sound for Mayoral Radio
